name: Narth Tezrin

trait.name: Cunning Action
text: On each of his turns, Narth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
text: Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runs a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.
Ideal: "The bigger the risk, the greater the reward."
Bond: "I adore my colleague Alestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her."
Flaw: "I'll risk life and limb to become a legend.-"

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.

description:
Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runs a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.
Ideal:"The bigger the risk, the greater the reward."
Bond:"I adore my colleague Alaestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her."
Flaw:"I'll risk life and limb to become a legend."
Source: Storm King's Thunder p. 254
